long_description: The Yogitoes Yoga Mat Towel is an absorbent, hygienic layer to place on your yoga mat to prevent slipping. 50% recycled polyester, 40% new polyester, 10% nylon. Patented design features 100% silicone nubs that grip so you don't slip; mat stays in place on your mat, floor, carpet. The Yogitoes Yoga Mat Towel is made using 8 recycled plastic bottles; dyes are free of heavy metals.
short_description: The Yogitoes Yoga Mat Towel is an absorbent, hygienic layer to place on your yoga mat to prevent slipping.
